snippet.title: Wild Thaw Trailer
snippet.description:
Wild Thaw is a third-person platformer about a fireball facing down a mountain of ice.

In Wild Thaw you play as a fireball, born of a volcano and the last hope to bring balance to the valley. Melt your way through walls of ice and grow ever larger by burning grass and trees. But don’t worry! As you burn through the valley you also spread life as seeds sprout flowers in your fiery wake.
